title: conditional statemen
message:
Conditional statements control the flow of any application 
You can make decisions in the code by asking true or false questions and based on the answer will determine what runs after
This is achieved by using if statements and if-else statements

Basic anatomy of is test condition into the body that will be executed if the test condition proves to be true

Switch Statements evaluate an input expression , matches the expression's value to a case clause, and executes statements associated with that case

A break statement should end the case
failure to add one will cause the next block to execute, which will most likely be unintentional
